 Modify user page. About me (Preferences). User Summary

plugin.name: RTx-Calendar
plugin.description:
This RT extension provides a calendar view for your tickets and your reminders so you see when is your next due ticket.
You can find it in the menu Search->Calendar.

plugin.name: ExcelFeed
plugin.description:
This extenstion allows you to generate RT reports in MS Excel XSLX format. It provides two ways to do this.
First, it adds a new MS Excel option to the 'Feeds' menu on the Query Builder search results page.
It also adds an option to the Dashboard subscription page that allows you to have scheduled dashboards emailed to recipients
as attached MS Excel files rather than inline HTML reports.

plugin.name: ExampleTheme
plugin.description:
RT::Extension::ExampleTheme is a small example of the customizations users can make to change the look and feel of RT.
These changes are saved as a theme for others to use.

plugin.name: GroupsByQueue
plugin.description:
Create new queue with two different user groups:
 one with _R suffix for read-only access to tickets, and another 
 with _RW for read-write access.
